body:
### Bayesian Analysis for the Social Sciences
This page contains information about the demonstration code for the course "Bayesian Analysis for the Social Sciences" at the [Essex Summer School in Social Science Data Analysis](http://essexsummerschool.com), taught by Richard D. Morey (@richarddmorey). 

### Demo: Rejection sampling
To try the first draft of the [`shiny`](http://shiny.rstudio.com) demonstration of [rejection sampling](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rejection_sampling), run the following code in R:

    shiny::runGitHub(repo = "EssexSummerSchoolBayes", username = "richarddmorey", subdir = "shiny_demo/rejection")
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
